Title: Authorizes employees to petition an employer to apply to participate in a shared work program for purposes of avoiding a layoff or for purposes of re-hiring
Summary: Authorizes employees to petition an employer to apply to participate in a shared work program for purposes of avoiding a layoff or for purposes of re-hiring.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to authorizing employees to petition an employer to apply to participate in a shared work program for purposes of avoiding a layoff or for purposes of re-hiring
